function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sodium hypochlorite disinfectant preparation may result in high energy consumption","Impact":"Increased operational costs and environmental impact","Mitigation":"Use a safe and reliable sodium hypochlorite generator with high electrical efficiency and other sustainable features","Technologies":"Sodium hypochlorite generator with high electrical efficiency","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, and the environment","Owner":"Facility managers, operational staff, and environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Sodium hypochlorite disinfectant has strong corrosiveness","Impact":"Risk of damage to containers, pipes, and equipment","Mitigation":"Use corrosion-resistant materials for containers, pipes, equipment, and accessories that come in contact with the sodium hypochlorite solution","Technologies":"Corrosion-resistant materials for containers, pipes, and equipment","People":"Laboratory technicians, facility maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility managers, maintenance department"},{"Description":"Sodium hypochlorite disinfectant poses a risk of higher pollution","Impact":"Environmental pollution and potential health risks","Mitigation":"Precipitate and filter the salt solution before adding it to the sodium hypochlorite generator","Technologies":"Precipitation and filtration system for salt solution","People":"Environmental organizations, healthcare workers","Owner":"Facility managers, environmental organizations"}]}
